title: ICSI को मिले नए लीडर्स: CS पवन जी चंदक बने प्रेसिडेंट, CS द्वारकानाथ चेन्नूर वाइस प्रेसिडेंट (2026 के लिए)
content:
# ICSI को मिले नए लीडर्स: CS पवन जी चंदक बने प्रेसिडेंट, CS द्वारकानाथ चेन्नूर वाइस प्रेसिडेंट (2026 के लिए)

Ek important update hai Company Secretaries fraternity ke liye! The Institute of Company Secretaries of India (ICSI) ne apne naye President aur Vice President ki announcement kar di hai.

The Institute of Company Secretaries of India (ICSI) ne CS Pawan G Chandak ko saal 2026 ke liye apna President chuna hai. Iske saath hi, CS Dwarakanath Chennur ko Vice President banaya gaya hai. Yeh appointments January 19, 2026 se effective ho gaye hain.

*   **ICSI President 2026:** CS Pawan G Chandak
*   **ICSI Vice President 2026:** CS Dwarakanath Chennur

Dono hi newly elected leaders, CS profession aur ICSI ko aage le jaane mein apna extensive experience aur expertise laayenge.

## Read the Official Document
*   [ICSI की Official Announcements yahan dekhein](https://www.icsi.edu/whats_new_icsi/)

*Published on: 22 January 2026*
